fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.nodes.interfaces

Interface RequestingImplI

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    RequestingCI

    public interface RequestingImplI
    The interface SensorNodeRequestingImplI defines the methods that a sensor node must implement to respond to requests on the sensor network.

    Description

    Black-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2024-01-09

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      QueryResultI execute(RequestI request)
      execute request, a process which may require to continue the execution on adjacent nodes in the sensor network.
      void executeAsync(RequestI request)
      execute request asynchronously, a process which may require to continue the execution on adjacent nodes in the sensor network and spawn multiple parallel continuations when the request launch several request continuations on its neighbour nodes and so on.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        QueryResultI execute(RequestI request)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        execute request, a process which may require to continue the execution on adjacent nodes in the sensor network.

        Contract

         pre     request != null
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        request - a request to be executed starting from the receiving node.
        Returns:
        the result of the query.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.

      • executeAsync

        void executeAsync(RequestI request)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        execute request asynchronously, a process which may require to continue the execution on adjacent nodes in the sensor network and spawn multiple parallel continuations when the request launch several request continuations on its neighbour nodes and so on.

        Contract

         pre     request != null && request.isAsynchronous()
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        request - a request to be executed starting from the receiving node.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
